alert.note: Alert for Jack; Palo Pinto; Stephens; Young (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 26 at 6:18PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Young, southwestern Jack, Stephens and northwestern Palo Pinto Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 616 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Bryson, or 8 miles east of Graham. This storm was nearly stationary. Additional strong thunderstorms are also impacting the area. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Graham, Breckenridge, Jacksboro, Bryson, Possum Kingdom State Park, Necessity, Crystal Falls, Newcastle and Us-180 Near The Shackelford- Stephens County Line. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. If on or near Possum Kingdom Lake, get out of the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.
